SELECT VCS.* , CASE WHEN SDDCTO IN('CA','CO','CR') AND TO_CHAR(TRIM(SDOORN)) IS NOT NULL THEN VCS.SDOORN WHEN SDDCTO NOT IN('CA','CO','CR') THEN TO_CHAR(VCS.SDDOCO) ELSE '' END ORDERNUM FROM V_CLOSED_SALESORDER VCS
AND SDAN8 = #{r_sdan8} AND SDSHAN = #{r_sdshan} AND SDADDJ >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{r_ssdaddj},'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') AND SDADDJ < TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{r_esdaddj}, 'YYYYMMDD')+1,'YYYYMMDD')
ORDER BY SDSHAN, SDADDJ, SDDOCO ASC, SDDCTO DESC

SELECT Z4CFY, Z4PN, Z4AN8, Z4AG_OPEN AS OPEN_AMOUNT, Z4AG_GROSS AS GROSS_AMOUNT, ABS(Z4AG_CHECKAMT_1) AS RECEIVED_CASH, ABS(Z4AG_CHECKAMT_5 + Z4AG_CHECKAMT_6) AS RECEIVED_NOTE, Z4AG_CURRENT AS CURRENT_AMOUNT
FROM ( SELECT XYZ.Z4CFY AS Z4CFY , MAX(XYZ.Z4PN) AS Z4PN , XYZ.Z4AN8 AS Z4AN8 , NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_OPEN), 0) AS Z4AG_OPEN , NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_GROSS ), 0) AS Z4AG_GROSS , NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_GROSS_1 ), 0) AS Z4AG_GROSS_1 , NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_GROSS_2 ), 0) AS Z4AG_GROSS_2 , NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_CHECKAMT_1), 0) AS Z4AG_CHECKAMT_1 , NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_CHECKAMT_2), 0) AS Z4AG_CHECKAMT_2 , NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_CHECKAMT_3), 0) AS Z4AG_CHECKAMT_3 , NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_CHECKAMT_4), 0) AS Z4AG_CHECKAMT_4 , NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_CHECKAMT_5), 0) AS Z4AG_CHECKAMT_5 , NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_CHECKAMT_6), 0) AS Z4AG_CHECKAMT_6 , NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_DISCOUNT ), 0) AS Z4AG_DISCOUNT
, NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_OPEN), 0) + NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_GROSS ), 0) + NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_CHECKAMT_1), 0) + NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_CHECKAMT_2), 0) + NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_CHECKAMT_3), 0) + NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_CHECKAMT_4), 0) + NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_CHECKAMT_5), 0) + NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_CHECKAMT_6), 0) + NVL(SUM(XYZ.Z4AG_DISCOUNT ), 0) AS Z4AG_CURRENT
FROM (
SELECT MON.Z4KCO AS Z4KCO , MON.Z4CFY AS Z4CFY , MON.Z4PN AS Z4PN , MON.Z4AN8 AS Z4AN8 , SUM(MON.Z4ENBL) AS Z4AG_OPEN , 0 AS Z4AG_GROSS , 0 AS Z4AG_GROSS_1 , 0 AS Z4AG_GROSS_2 , 0 AS Z4AG_CHECKAMT_1 , 0 AS Z4AG_CHECKAMT_2 , 0 AS Z4AG_CHECKAMT_3 , 0 AS Z4AG_CHECKAMT_4 , 0 AS Z4AG_CHECKAMT_5 , 0 AS Z4AG_CHECKAMT_6 , 0 AS Z4AG_DISCOUNT FROM PRODLGKDTA.F59K3034@LGKEORDER MON INNER JOIN PRODLGKDTA.F0901@LGKEORDER ACT ON ACT.GMAID = MON.Z4AID
1 = 1 AND MON.Z4Z5ABCD = 'S' AND ACT.GMOBJ NOT IN('426010', '000000') AND MON.Z4KCO IN('95600', '95601') AND MON.Z4CFY = #{r_z4cfy} AND MON.Z4PN < #{r_z4pn} AND MON.Z4AN8 = #{r_z4an8}
GROUP BY MON.Z4KCO, MON.Z4CFY, MON.Z4PN, MON.Z4AN8
UNION ALL
SELECT DAL.Z3KCO AS Z3KCO , DAL.Z3CFY AS Z3CFY , DAL.Z3PN AS Z3PN , DAL.Z3AN8 AS Z3AN8 , 0 AS Z3AG_OPEN , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DAL.Z3URC1 IN('R09', 'R10', 'R11', 'R12') THEN DAL.Z3AG END), 0) AS Z3AG_GROSS , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DAL.Z3URC1 IN('R09', 'R10') THEN DAL.Z3AG END), 0) AS Z3AG_GROSS_1 , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DAL.Z3URC1 IN('R11', 'R12') THEN DAL.Z3AG END), 0) AS Z3AG_GROSS_2 , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DAL.Z3URC1 = 'R34' THEN DAL.Z3AG*-1 WHEN DAL.Z3URC1 IN('R18', 'R21', 'R28', 'R35', 'R36') THEN DAL.Z3AG END), 0 ) AS Z3AG_CHECKAMT_1 , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DAL.Z3URC1 = 'R30' THEN DAL.Z3AG END), 0) AS Z3AG_CHECKAMT_2 , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DAL.Z3URC1 = 'R31' THEN DAL.Z3AG END), 0) AS Z3AG_CHECKAMT_3 , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DAL.Z3URC1 = 'R22' THEN DAL.Z3AG END), 0) AS Z3AG_CHECKAMT_4 , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DAL.Z3URC1 IN('R13', 'R29') THEN DAL.Z3AG*-1 END), 0) AS Z3AG_CHECKAMT_5 , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DAL.Z3URC1 IN('R14', 'R39') THEN DAL.Z3AG*-1 END), 0) AS Z3AG_CHECKAMT_6 , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DAL.Z3URC1 IN('R25', 'R26') THEN DAL.Z3AG END), 0) AS Z3AG_DISCOUNT FROM PRODLGKDTA.F59K3033@LGKEORDER DAL
1 = 1 AND DAL.Z3KCO IN('95600', '95601') AND DAL.Z3CFY = #{r_z3cfy} AND DAL.Z3PN = #{r_z3pn} AND DAL.Z3AN8 = #{r_z3an8}
GROUP BY DAL.Z3KCO, DAL.Z3CFY, DAL.Z3PN, DAL.Z3AN8 ) XYZ WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY XYZ.Z4CFY , XYZ.Z4AN8)

SELECT SMH.*, CT.CUST_NM SMH_CUSTNM, ST.SHIPTO_NM SMH_SHIPTONM FROM SENDMAILHISTORY SMH LEFT JOIN O_CUSTOMER CT ON CT.CUST_CD = SMH.SMH_CUSTCD LEFT JOIN O_SHIPTO ST ON ST.SHIPTO_CD = SMH.SMH_SHIPTOCD
AND SMH_ID = #{r_smhid}
